channel.title: Biden steel boom on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Biden steel boom on FinanClub

item.title: CLF
item.description: score:-6 Chances: Cleveland-Cliffs’ attempt to buy U.S. Steel gaining ground. Exclusive assignment of the right to bid from United Steelworkers. Positive reaction to the surge in U.S. Steel stock after takeover talks. Consolidation in the steel industry promising potential benefits. Biden’s steel boom supporting potential growth in the industry.
